anime.description: The protagonist, Bottom Biting Bug XVIII (age 10), loves to happily sing and dance more than anything else in the world. When bitten by a Bottom Biting Bug, people with hunched backs will have their posture corrected, depressed people will start to laugh, and people who had no confidence will suddenly become self-assured - those bitten are cheered up until they seem like entirely different people. However, even the Bottom Biting Bug makes many mistakes... This story featuring typical scenes from everyday life will continue to evolve through the sort of humor that kids love. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

episode.title: 結成!?かじり探偵団
Newly Formed?! Biter Detective Team
episode.summary: All the toothbrushes in town have been stolen overnight! The living of a Bottom Biting Bug depends on brushing his teeth, so it`s a real crisis if they can`t brush! B.B.B., Capline, Fatton, and Pak form a "biter detective team" to catch the thief! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: えー!? 大王タコ
What?! The Great King Octopus
episode.summary: The takoyaki shop run by Tasuke`s father, Ippei, isn`t very successful. But if he can make the ultimate takoyaki, maybe he`ll get more customers! So Ippei sets out to catch the legendary Great King Octopus (100 meters long, weighing 100 tons). Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガブハチ先生, また恋!?
Mr. Gab, In Love Again?!
episode.summary: Mr. Gab has been acting strangely all day. He`s talking about nothing but flowers, and flowers fill the classroom. It turns out he`s in love with the florist, Sacchan! He`s been going to the flower shop to see her every day, talking about flowers and buying them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 出た, お化けカブトムシ!?
There It Is! The Monster Rhinoceros Beetle?!
episode.summary: As B.B.B. is preparing to go bug catching, Grandpa tells him that he was once called the bug catching king. He claims that he saw a bug of unbelievable proportions in the depths of the Amazon, but B.B.B. doesn`t believe him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 主役!? たーすけくん
The Lead?! Tasuke-kun
episode.summary: Tasuke`s class is performing "Cinderella" for the school play. Everyone`s idol, Sakura-san, is playing Cinderella, and purely by accident, Tasuke volunteers to play the prince! Tasuke has a habit of passing gas when he`s nervous, so he`s worried that he`ll ruin the play if it happens during the big proposal scene at the end. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: なくせ!? 忘れ物
Lose the Habit?! Forgetting Things
episode.summary: B.B.B. often forgets to bring things to school. Yet again today, he`s earned a "You fool!" from Mr. Gab. He absolutely can`t forget to bring his toothbrush for tomorrow`s class, not to mention the letter his mother wants him to mail, a book Capline wants to borrow, his homework, and lots of other things... so B.B.B. enacts a plan! Can he lose the habit of forgetting things?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 俳句大好き!? 校長先生
The Haiku-loving Principal?!
episode.summary: Today`s class is about haiku, and the school principal, who loves haiku, is teaching in Mr. Gab`s place. After learning how haiku are composed, B.B.B. and the other students try making their own. The principal is moved by all of their haiku... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: パックン, 特訓!?
Pak`s Training?!
episode.summary: Pak`s bike still has training wheels. Capline tries to teach him how to ride without them, but Pak refuses and says stubbornly that he`ll learn on his own. Eager to help her brother who`s trying so hard, Capline tries giving him all sorts of advice in disguise. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おもてなし!? ガブレロ一家
Hospitality?! Gabriel`s Family
episode.summary: Gabriel`s family has arrived at B.B.B.`s house unannounced! His parents are trying to design a car aimed at commoners, so they`ve come to experience how B.B.B.`s family lives in hopes of better understanding commoners. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 宇宙人, あらわる!?
An Alien Appears?!
episode.summary: When B.B.B. asks if aliens really exist, his grandpa says "Of course they do." Intrigued, B.B.B. takes his friends to hunt for an alien. On the way to the top of Bottom Hill, where Grandpa said he has seen aliens before, they spot alien-like footprints, strange writing, and a ray gun?! Will B.B.B. and his friends find an alien?! Source: crunchyroll
